resources.string: Please describe what you were doing just before the crash if possible, and then press Send:
Sorry, RedneckRacer Lite encountered a problem and had to close. Would you like to send a crash report, which may help the us to fix the problem?

Could not read the log. Perhaps you are on a T-Mobile Pulse (Huawei U8220) where logcat fails (complain to Huawei about it?) Meanwhile, send an ordinary bug report to {0}, describing what you did and what happened, and we may still be able to help you.
